data.actual_result: Nothing happens. This is kinda random, might not be able to reproduce the first time.
data.short_description: Cannot open channel drawer switching orientation while member list is open
data.steps_to_repro: - Open discord initially in portrait mode - Go to a server and switch to landscape mode - Click on the members icon  - Click on any user and open his profile - Lurk there for a while (didn't work for me until I waited at least 10-15 seconds) - Close their profile but do not close the member list yet - Switch back to portrait mode and close the member list - Click on the 3 lines on top left to open the channel drawer
